chargeHist.descr: Arson of Building w/o Owner's Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Arson of Building w/o Owner's Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darrell Lesean Greer

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke appeared by video for Darrell Lesean Greer.  Attorney Gerald Henry Alder in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates.  State's offer withdrawn.  Mr. Greer requests to speak to Attorney Lamke in a breakout room.  Case passed.

...
Case recalled, same appearances.

Defense requests a new date for plea and sentencing.  Court rescheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court for Darrell Lesean Greer.  Attorney Gerald Henry Alder in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a return on Doctor's report.  Doctor's report states the defendant is competent to proceed.  Parties do not contest Doctor's findings.  Court adopts the findings, reinstates the proceedings, and schedules a plea and sentencing date.  Conditions on bond continue.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea hearing.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court not in session 07-28-2022 
plea hearing rescheduled to 08-18-2022 at 9:00 am, Branch

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Darrell Lesean Greer not in court, in custody.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests a projected guilty plea date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Darrell Lesean Greer not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
OFF THE RECORD. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in court with Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke; both appear by video.  Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 02, Judge Childs. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

OFF THE RECORD: Parties are not present.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing 2/22/2022. Milwaukee County Office of Emergency Management declared a snow emergency for 2/22/2022 therefore this matter will be rescheduled. Case is adjourned for CAUSE a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.   This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with HJG
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Darrell Lesean Greer in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Darrell Lesean Greer appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
